data.title: International Level
data.text:
​​​​Allen College, IowaCollaboration on the level of medical student exchangeAmerican Institute for Radiologic PathologyRotation of residents from AUBMC at AIRPBaylor College of MedicineAcademic and clinical interchange of faculty and students, and clinical academic and research information

Cleveland ClinicCollaboration on the level of Continuing Medical Education. This collaboration will allow the CME office at AUBMC to serve as an extension of the CCF CCE and certify educational activities in Lebanon and the region.

Columbia UniversityCooperation in education and scientific research. Enrollment of visiting students for clinical and research electives. Exchange of scientific materials and information

Duke UniversityEnrollment of visiting students for clinical and research electives

George Washington University Medical Center (GWU)The objective is to establish a medical student exchange program and collaboration, for GWU and AUB students in the third and fourth year of study

Global Medical Excellence (GME)AUBMC performs in-patient and out-patient procedures for GME recruited patients

Great Baltimore Medical CenterCollaboration in Medical EducationHenry Ford HospitalOBS/GYN Rotation of residents from AUBMC at Henry Ford Hospital

Holy Cross Hospital of Silver Spring, IncorporatedAUBMC students receive clinical education related to OBS/GYN at Holy Cross Hospital of Silver Spring, Incorporated

Instituto Euro-Mediterraneo Di Scienza E Tecnologia (IEMEST) (Palermo, Italy)Cooperation in collaborative research projects and on the academic level, including mutual exchange of students, researchers and faculty.Johns HopkinsCollaboration in the areas of education, research and patient care

Johns Hopkins (School of Nursing)The goal of this collaboration is to develop academic cooperation and exchange collaboration, and to engage in faculty and student exchange between the two schools of nursing. Laval UniversityMedical student exchange program

Medical Welfare Trust FundHealthcare AssistanceMc MasterMc Master medical students are provided with practical clinical training and experience at AUBMC.

MD Anderson Cancer CenterSister Institution Relationship. Development of formalized academic and clinical programs. Developing and exchanging clinical, educational, prevention and research programs for the eradication of cancer.

Medical University of South Carolina (MUSC)Exchange of students and faculty in addition to research collaboration in the discipline of Biomedical Sciences and graduate studies

Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer CenterCollaboration with MSKCC is through the international office at Memorial. The objective is to develop academic collaboration between MSKCC and FM/AUBMC. Activities include teaching conferences at AUB (during MEMA), monthly videoconferences, and clinical exchange visits.

Ministry of Health, CyprusProvision of workshop on Geriatric NursingMontpellierCollaboration on the level of academic exchange.

Palermo UniversityCooperation in research and higher education

Regions Hospital (Minesotta)Provide an educational setting at Regions Hospital for senior year medical students from FM/AUBMC. Medical students from FM/AUBMC will participate in educational and patient care programs at Regions Hospital

St. George's University of London / Medical School at the University of Nicosia

Academic and research collaboration and exchange of teaching staff, medical students, post-graduate trainees and research and academic resources

St. Jude Children Research Hospital & the Children Cancer Center of LebanonEstablishment of the Children's Cancer Clinic of Lebanon, which will be the exclusive provider of pediatric oncology care and treatment at AUB, in association with SJCRH

The University of PiotiersCooperation developed in the field of neurosciences research

Union Memorial HospitalParticipation of trainees from Union Memorial Hospital in a clinical training rotation at AUBMC

University of Arizona Medical Center at TucsonAUB medical students to take electives in Cardiology, Neurology, and/or nephrology.

University of ChicagoCollaboration on the level of medical student exchangeUniversity of IllinoisExchange of students and faculty members; joint research activities and educational programs

University of MarylandCooperation in education and research in the areas of bioethics and public healthUniversity of Maryland SONExchange of faculty and students and research cooperation

University of Massachusetts Medical SchoolMedical student, faculty, clinical, academic and research information exchange.

University of Michigan SONCollaboration in Nursing educationUniversity of Paris 7Exchange of students and researchers; collaboration for grants and research activities

University of Technology, Sydney (School of Nursing)Collaboration on the levels of exchange of students for the purposes of study and research, exchange of staff for the purposes of research, teaching and discussions, and joint academic and research activities.University of ToledoExchange of faculty, staff and students, development of medical facilities and programs, as well as exchange of educational and scientific material. University of Toledo - Diabetes CenterCollaboration to establish a joint diabetes research and training center to be located at FM/AUBMC, with the goal of conducting basic, translational and clinical research in diabetes and associated diseases, promoting the training and education of faculty, staff and research fellows, and developing a Ph.D. track in Cardiovascular and Metabolic Diseases.VanderbiltCollaboration in medical educationVillanovaCollaboration in Nursing education
